front.title: On Forwarding 6LoWPAN Fragments over a Multihop IPv6 Network

abstract.t: This document provides generic rules to enable the forwarding of 6LoWPAN fragment over a route-over network. Forwarding fragments can improve both the end-to-end latency and reliability, and reduce the buffer requirements in intermediate nodes; it may be implemented using RFC 4944 and virtual reassembly buffers.
